text: Ollon is a municipality in the Aigle district in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. The municipality is in the foothills of the mountains southeast of Lake Geneva. == References == == Other websites == * Official website of the municipality of Ollon * Official website of the tourism region Villars- Gryon * Website of the castles: Ch√¢teau de la Roche * Aerial views of Ollon * * Category:Municipalities in Aigle
title: Ollon
